welcomePage.title: Welcome to Chroma
welcomePage.subtitle: Chroma is a colour alchemist. It transmutes a single colour in a full set of tokens including primary and neutral colour palettes and semantic token sets for light and dark mode. Currently in BETA

controls.harmonyModeHelper: Determines the relationship between primary colour and the one used to tint the neutral palettes.

harmonyModes.title: Unity
harmonyModes.description: Unified, pure tonal variation. All neutrals share identical temperature.

harmonyModes.title: Opposition
harmonyModes.description: Maximum contrast, opposing warmth. Creates dramatic cool vs warm neutrals.

harmonyModes.title: Harmony
harmonyModes.description: Harmonious, gentle variation. Subtle temperature shift within same color family.
